import React from 'react'; const Home: React.FC = () => { return (

Welcome to South Pool Skeptics

We are a new local group meeting on the first Tuesday of the month at the Millbrook Inn in South Pool (and other local pubs) to explore science, critical thinking, and rational inquiry over a friendly pint. Inspired by the global 'Skeptics in the Pub' movement, we welcome everyone — from curious newcomers to seasoned skeptics. No jargon, no preaching — just thoughtful conversation in good company.

Next meeting

Where: Millbrook Inn, South Pool

When: First Tuesday of the month, 7:30 PM

Join us for a pint and some stimulating discussion!

); }; export default Home;
